fullText: Joshua Harmon's Significant Other is a beautifully written, ruthlessly honest comedy about the particular pain of being the single friend watching everyone else pair off.
dtliExcerpt: Joshua Harmon's Significant Other is a beautifully written, ruthlessly honest comedy about the particular pain of being the single friend watching everyone else pair off.
